rev.desc.rev.desc: QCCR702 - "close" master format control was not running when the phase changed.RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: decide.showChange: New decision panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: display.masterChange: New format.cdis panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: displayChange: Changed the exit from display.go to display.master RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: get.fcChange: Changed the exit from run.init.fc to get.master.fc Changed the exit from setup.display to get.master.fc RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: get.master.fcChange: New se.get.record panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: parameterChange: Added the "Show Close Prompt?" parameter RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: run.del.noshow.masterChange: New format.cdel panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: run.del.noshowChange: New format.cdel panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: run.init.fcChange: Changed the exit from display to run.init.master RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: run.init.masterChange: New format.cint panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: setup.displayChange: Removed unused panel RAD: change.prompt.closePanel: run.init.masterChange: New format.cint panel
